meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Fell</kanji> trees and <kanji>gather</kanji> them up. That's called <vocabulary>lumbering</vocabulary>. Or if you cut them all down and take every last one, it's <vocabulary>deforestation</vocabulary> and you should be ashamed!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
